title: external storage (owncloud / webdav) blank files
body:
### expected behaviour
download/edit files mounted from servera in serverb with https

### actual behaviour
all files mounted from servera with https in serverb are blank (but with the correct size in the web ui file list)  

if the folder is not mount using https servera, all files work fine and from serverb i can download files with the original content

### steps to reproduce
1. mount in serverb folder from https://servera/remote.php/webdav/ into folder testservera marking https:// checkbox
2. download any file in the mounted folder


### server configuration
operating system: debian squeeze

web server: apache 2.2

database: sqlite 

php version: php 5.4

owncloud versions:
owncloud 5.0.13 
owncloud 7.0 pre alpha (daily) build:2013-12-10t04:06:56+00:00


updated from an older owncloud or fresh install: fresh install

list of activated app:
default activated apps and external storage support 0.2
the content of config/config.php: (without the database password and passwordsalt)
$config = array (
  'instanceid' => 'ocbbaef9653d',
  'datadirectory' => '/home/test/www/data',
  'dbtype' => 'sqlite3',
  'version' => '6.90.0.0',
  'installed' => true,
  'loglevel' => '0',
);


### client configuration
browser: versiã³n 30.0.1599.114

operating system: ubuntu 12.10

### logs
#### web server error log
```
nothing relevant
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
nothing relevant
```

#### browser log
```
nothing relevant
```
